translation.en: -Here you go. -♪ Nails, hair, hips, heels ♪
Ooh! Nothin' like a chip clip to save the day, honey.
Taken right from my Cheeto bag.
translation.zh: ‎这夹子是我刚从薯片袋子里拿出来的

translation.en: I'm kidding. Am I? Been up since 3:00 a.m. I have no idea who I am!
translation.zh:
‎开玩笑的 我从凌晨三点
‎忙到现在 整个人都懵了

translation.en: -Hey, Mavis? -I'll be right there, okay?
[Mavis] Ooh! Looking good.
Let me see this right here.
Perfect.
Oh, did you know your hand is making a fist?
Sorry. I'm just nervous. First Essence shoot.
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 我太紧张了
‎第一次给《本质》杂志拍照

translation.en: Repeat after me.
I am worthy. I am perfect. I am enough.
translation.zh: ‎我光芒万丈 无所不能 乘风破浪

translation.en: I am worthy. I am perfect. I am enough.
translation.zh: ‎我光芒万丈 无所不能 乘风破浪

translation.en: You got this, bitch. Just breathe.
-Okay. -Hey.
Yeah?
Marissa's dress won't stay up, and she scratched me, definitely on purpose.
translation.zh:
‎玛丽萨的裙子
‎提不起来 她还故意抓我

translation.en: Okay. Just put some double-stick tape on her titties. And… let's see.
translation.zh: ‎给她的胸上贴双面胶就行了

translation.en: Do I have some still? Goldfish.
translation.zh: ‎我看看有没有啊？给你一袋金鱼小吃

translation.en: Do you know models and toddlers have the same diet?
translation.zh: ‎你知道模特和小孩都喜欢吃这个吗？

translation.en: -Copy that. Also Trent wants to see you. -Yes, he does.
translation.zh:
‎-明白 特伦特想见你
‎-知道了

translation.en: -♪ I don't dance… ♪ -Here we go.
-♪ I work… ♪ -Beautiful.
Here you go.
These are not the ones I wanted.
This is exactly what you asked for.
Mavis?
I… I'll figure it out.
-♪ And I might let you see… ♪ -How am I supposed to know what you want?
translation.zh: ‎我怎么知道你究竟想要哪双啊？

translation.en: -I'm not a mind reader. -[man] Yes.
I hope this isn't too forward, but I know beauty when I see it,
translation.zh:
‎我希望你不要
‎觉得我太过唐突 你太美了

translation.en: and the camera loves you.
Is that right?
Well, it must be my drumstick-emoji physique.
translation.zh: ‎一定是我曼妙的身姿吸引了你

translation.en: It's meaty on top, nubby on the bottom. Very delicious.
translation.zh:
‎该大的地方大
‎该小的地方小 秀色可餐

translation.en: That's what it is. You must be one of those models, huh?
Me? A model? For Essence?
[man] Yes.
They could never afford me, honey.
translation.zh: ‎他们可请不请我 亲爱的

translation.en: -[camera clicking] -[man] Sorry, baby. That's it.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 宝贝 就是这样

translation.en: -I can't take anymore. Come here. -Oh, come on. What?
translation.zh:
‎-我受不了了 过来
‎-拜托 搞什么啊？

translation.en: [Trent] Yuck.
Mavis, you're distracting genius.
translation.zh: ‎梅维斯 你别给摄影师添乱

translation.en: -[Mavis] Huh. -Don't worry about him.
All right. When we're done, I have to do a bunch of stuff for him.
translation.zh: ‎好了 待会我还得帮他做一大堆事情

translation.en: I'm gonna meet Khalil, so I'm gonna be home late.
translation.zh:
‎还要去见卡里尔
‎所以要很晚才能回家

translation.en: At least we get time together at work today.
translation.zh: ‎至少今天上班期间我们还能在一起

translation.en: -Yeah, I love you so much. -I love you, baby.
translation.zh:
‎-是啊 我好爱你
‎-我爱你 宝贝

translation.en: -See you-- -[Trent] Mavis!
I'm coming. God!
[woman] It's just…
I don't like it. It's not working.
-[woman] Trent, I don't like it. -Okay, message received, Sydney.
translation.zh: ‎特伦特 我不喜欢这种造型 ‎好的 收到 悉尼

translation.en: Mavis, we gonna need some help here.
-On it. -♪ Girl ♪
-♪ I don't play, I slay ♪ -Yes!
-Okay, so wait until I tell you. -[model] Gotcha.
Mavis, you need to remember I'm the lead stylist.
translation.zh: ‎梅维斯 你要记住 我才是首席造型师

translation.en: I styled Mariah Carey into Mariah Christmas,
translation.zh:
‎玛丽亚凯莉在爆款专辑里面的
‎造型可是我设计的

translation.en: and this is gonna look ridiculous.
It's gonna be fire.
-You ready, baby? -I got you.
translation.zh:
‎-准备好了吗 亲爱的？
‎-好了

translation.en: Okay. Now!
-This is beautiful. -♪ Drop for me… ♪
[Sydney] Looks like a butterfly, a fashion butterfly. I love this.
translation.zh:
‎就像一只蝴蝶
‎时尚的蝴蝶 我喜欢这个造型

translation.en: Got it.
All right!
Trent, why didn't you think of this?
Mark that one. Mark that one. You know what? Just mark them all.
Sydney, you know my girlfriend, Mavis Beaumont?
translation.zh: ‎悉尼 这是我女朋友梅维斯博蒙特

translation.en: -Hi. -Oh, hi.
Nice to meet you. I'm such a fan.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴认识你 久仰大名

translation.en: Well, now I can say the same about you.
Thank you.
Syd, you know, obviously, it's time for Mavis to move to lead stylist.
translation.zh: ‎悉尼  梅维斯有资格做首席造型师

translation.en: Didn't you say you were doing a layout with Lizzo's dancers? She'd kill that.
translation.zh:
‎你不是说你要给丽珠的伴舞
‎设计造型吗？她可是不二人选

translation.en: Lizzo and the Big Grrrls? That is my jam.
translation.zh: ‎是“丽珠和大女孩”节目吗？我超喜欢

translation.en: Well, that would be a pretty high-profile piece for your first lead job, but, um…
translation.zh: ‎你第一次上手就接触这种大制作…

translation.en: I don't know. After what you did today, yeah, I think we should talk.
translation.zh:
‎我想想啊 鉴于你
‎今天的表现 我们可以聊聊

translation.en: I'll have my office reach out. We'll set up a meeting for… Friday?
translation.zh:
‎我的工作室会联系你的
‎安排周五面试可以吗？

translation.en: Amazing! That'd be amazing. Oh my God! Thank you so much.
translation.zh: ‎太棒了 天啊 非常感谢

translation.en: -Thank you, baby! -Awesome, baby. You got this.
translation.zh: ‎太棒了 亲爱的 你可以的

translation.en: -[Mavis] Hey. -[man] Hey.
Sorry I'm running late.
Trent sent me all over town returning shit.
translation.zh: ‎特伦特让我把那些道具都还回去

translation.en: Let me tell you somethin'. I am so over assisting.
translation.zh: ‎告诉你 我实在不想做助理了

translation.en: All good. I'm running behind myself.
Good game.
Okay, quit playing.
Trying to make me do overtime, knowing I got somewhere to go.
translation.zh: ‎我还有事呢 打什么加时赛啊

translation.en: Who you got over there?
Let's just call her basket bae.
More like basket hay. I know that's right.
-[man chuckles] -Listen, I had to stop home.
I've had to pee for 42 whole-ass minutes. You know I'm too cute for a public toilet.
translation.zh: ‎我已经整整憋尿憋了42分钟了 ‎我可不想上公共厕所

translation.en: Bitch, please. But I started to pee just a little bit.
Why is there always a TMI situation with you when it come to peeing in the bathroom?
translation.zh:
‎为什么我每次打电话
‎你都在厕所里尿尿？

translation.en: Let me tell you, you're gross. You're my best friend, but you're gross.
translation.zh:
‎你太恶心了
‎你虽然是我最好的朋友 但你很恶心

translation.en: Baby, Jesus Christ. What are you doing home?
What in the actual fuck, Jacque?
-Oh shit! -[Jacque] No, no, no, no, no, no, no!
Mavis, no. Think about what you're doing before you do it. -Don't go all Jersey on us. -[Mavis grunts]
translation.zh: ‎梅维斯 你要顾全大局 别动粗

translation.en: Don't hurt him!
[shrieking] What?
-[Jacque] Chill! -[Mavis] Get off of me!
Get off of me!
Get off!
♪ One time For the big girls in the crowd ♪
I just got this feeling I'mma find a dildo up in here.
I'm not a monster. Those are the first things I packed.
translation.zh:
‎我又不是疯子
‎那些东西我早就打包好了

translation.en: -I gotta get somethin' from the bathroom. -Yeah.
[Mavis screaming] Fuck him!
-You didn't hear anything, did you? -No. Nope.
Oh no, no. Don't take that. That's Jacque's. It stays.
translation.zh: ‎别 那是雅克的 给他留下

translation.en: Uh, we taking everything that's worth somethin' in here, okay?
translation.zh:
‎我们要把所有
‎值钱的东西都拿走 明白吗？

translation.en: So I'm just gonna put this in the bag.
We got that in Mozambique.
That's the trip where he asked me to move in with him.
translation.zh:
‎我们当时去那旅游的时候
‎他就提出和我同居

translation.en: It was like a princess fairy tale.
translation.zh: ‎当时就像公主和王子的童话故事一样

translation.en: Look at this place.
Look at him.
Look at you.
Look, I know Jacque come from money, but you held him down.
translation.zh: ‎我知道雅克没钱 是你一直养着他

translation.en: You supported that man emotionally and financially, right?
translation.zh:
‎你在感情上和
‎经济上都在全力支持他 对吧？

translation.en: Don't forget that.
You pulled your own, working them two jobs.
Waitressing at night and then being his studio manager during the day?
translation.zh:
‎晚上当服务员
‎白天做他的工作室助理

translation.en: -Come on. -Yeah, fuck that dude. You know what?
translation.zh:
‎-对吧
‎-是啊 去他的 你知道吗？

translation.en: -I did hold his ass down. For many years. -Mm-hmm.
And I never brought up marriage, ever. He always brought it up.
translation.zh:
‎我从未提起过结婚这事
‎他总在我面前念叨个不停

translation.en: And he never even put a ring on it. God!
translation.zh: ‎但他从未向我求过婚 ‎天啊 我一直都是围着他在转

translation.en: It's always been about what he wants, what works for him.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我一直都是围着他在转

translation.en: And that's why I'mma take his Fendi jacket too.
translation.zh: ‎所以我要把他的芬迪外套拿走

translation.en: 'Cause if you gotta see his dick in another woman,
translation.zh: ‎他敢在你面前和其他女人乱搞

translation.en: he should see that jacket on another man.
translation.zh: ‎那就让其他男人也去穿他的外套

translation.en: And not just any other woman. A skinny model version of me?
translation.zh:
‎他竟然按照我的样子
‎找了一位苗条的模特

translation.en: Like, how fucking hurtful and basic.
And you know what people say.
If someone cheats on Halle Berry, they're like, "Oh my God."
translation.zh:
‎如果哈莉贝瑞的男友背着她出轨
‎别人会说“天哪”

translation.en: "How that man cheat on Halle Berry?" But if someone cheats on someone like me?
translation.zh:
‎“他怎么能背着哈莉贝瑞偷吃？”
‎但如果换做是我呢？

translation.en: A thick girl… with problem areas?
They're like, "Oh yeah, I get it."
You know everyone talks, Khalil. That's what they say.
translation.zh: ‎你懂的 他们一定会这么说的

translation.en: They're like, "He's the hot photographer, and I'm just lucky to be with him."
translation.zh:
‎他们会说 “他可是性感的摄影师
‎我能和他在一起是我的福气”

translation.en: -Okay, stop. -Khalil?
-Mave. -Khalil.
Stop.
Do not breathe life into that silly-ass narrative.
When somebody cheats,
that's them trying to stroke they own ego.
Plus,
don't you always be the one saying thick girls having a moment?
It's "mo-ment."
Sorry. Say it again?
"Mo" like a Monique, but "meant" like "mo-ment."
-"Mo-ment"? -Yeah.
Yes. Yes. "Mo-ment."
Thick girls having a "mo-ment."
Time to have that "mo-ment."
-Okay. -[softly] All right.
-I love you. -I love you too.
Now where does Jacque keep his cameras?
Mavis, can we please talk?
What you need?
Just give us a minute.
Okay.
Wait. Is that my jacket, fam?
translation.zh: ‎等等 那不是我的外套吗？

translation.en: My nigga, you got way bigger problems than this jacket.
translation.zh: ‎傻逼 还外套呢 你麻烦可大了

translation.en: Come on, Mavis.
Right now I'm so, so sorry. We can't throw five years away.
translation.zh:
‎非常抱歉 但这五年的
‎感情不能说断就断啊

translation.en: Look, it only happened this one time. I swear.
translation.zh: ‎我就偷吃过一次 我发誓

translation.en: We can work this out.
We're supposed to be married,
have kids,
do all that Bonnie and Clyde shit.
translation.zh:
‎做一对像邦妮
‎和克莱德那样的鸳鸯大盗

translation.en: Jacque, I know things weren't perfect,
but you coulda let me know you weren't happy before you stepped out.
translation.zh:
‎但你和别人上床前应该
‎告诉我你跟我在一起不开心啊

translation.en: I know that. And I'm sorry.
-Babe, let me make it up to you. -No!
Where you gonna go?
I'mma keep it moving and keep my plants watered.
Yo.
Do I look crazy? I feel crazy.
translation.zh: ‎我看起来是不是有病？跟疯子一样

translation.en: Yes, you look crazy.
I'm moving you to Brooklyn to live with a total stranger…
translation.zh:
‎我帮你搬到布鲁克林去
‎还要跟一位陌生人同居…

translation.en: Yes.
…who could be a serial killer, or worse, an investment banker.
translation.zh:
‎对方可能是位连环杀手
‎或者更糟 是位投资银行家

translation.en: Really? Those are my only two options?
translation.zh:
‎真的吗？我命中注定
‎遇到这两类人吗？

translation.en: Come on, Khalil. Roommatefinder.net is a legitimate website, okay?
translation.zh:
‎拜托 卡里尔
‎贝壳网是合法的租赁网站好吗？

translation.en: I paid three whole dollars to sign up. I saw it on a bus, so I know it's real.
translation.zh:
‎我花了三美元注册
‎我在公交车上看到过广告 是真的

translation.en: And I FaceTimed Jade at least four and a half minutes,
translation.zh: ‎我和杰德视频了至少四分半钟

translation.en: and she had kind eyes and, um, didn't ask for my credit score,
translation.zh: ‎她眼神很善良 也没问我的信用评分

translation.en: which is like the most important.
Yeah. Sounds… Yeah. Oh shit, Mavis. Get up.
translation.zh: ‎对 听起来…该死 梅维斯 收拾东西

translation.en: -We gotta go. -What? Why? -We gotta go. We gotta go. -Why?
Lisa Bonet top hat.
Oh God, Khalil! Are you serious?
translation.zh: ‎天啊 卡里尔 你别开玩笑好吗？

translation.en: When you gonna stop running from women you slept with? We are 38 years old!
translation.zh:
‎你什么时候开始
‎逃避炮友了？我们都38岁了

translation.en: Obviously never. Move your feet!
Sorry my friend's a ho!
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 都怪我朋友喜欢乱约炮

translation.en: It's an emergency!
[Mavis] Hello?
Hello?
Mavis, hi!
-Hi! -Hi. Welcome! Welcome!
Namaste.
To you too. So nice to finally meet you, Jade.
translation.zh: ‎纳玛斯特 终于见到你了 杰德

translation.en: -Um, where's my bedroom? -Right behind you.
-Oh! -Yeah, I feng shui-ed it and everything.
translation.zh:
‎-哦
‎-里面的风水格局都是我布置的

translation.en: Oh, thank you. It's great.
-Sorry, uh, this is my best friend Khalil. -Oh my…
translation.zh:
‎-抱歉 这是我最好的朋友 卡里尔
‎-天啊

translation.en: [Jade] Hi. Hi. Well, if you're her best friend, you're my best friend.
translation.zh:
‎嗨 如果你是她最好的朋友
‎那你就是我最好的朋友

translation.en: [Khalil] Yeah. So, Jade,
I just touched this chair,
and now there's a greasy film, like, inside of my hand,
translation.zh: ‎现在我手上有一层黏糊糊的东西

translation.en: and you don't have a Jheri curl, so I don't… That's not what that is.
But if you could walk me through all of this?
It's just olive oil.
Yeah. I just put it all over my body, my hair, all the time.
translation.zh: ‎对 我喜欢给身体和头发涂橄榄油

translation.en: It just… It's so wonderful for you.
And, yeah, any time, like, my body needs love, I rub it in.
translation.zh: ‎每当我护理身体的时候就要抹它

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Like a little pasta dish, you know?
I think I will not do that.
Yeah. That's… Thank you though. That was very…
-Oh shit! That pillow got feet. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-该死 枕头怎么还张脚了
‎-什么？

translation.en: -[Jade] It's my kitty cat. It's Coco. -Oh.
-[Jade] It's Coco. -You never mentioned you had a cat.
[Jade] Surprise!
-His full name is Cocaine Xavier. -[Mavis] Of course it is.
translation.zh: ‎他的全名是可卡因泽维尔 ‎猫起这个名字简直太霸气了

translation.en: -That is a very strong name for a cat. -Snort him up.
translation.zh: ‎猫起这个名字简直太霸气了 ‎我没事就吸猫玩

translation.en: Are you gonna be okay here?
[whispers] I, um…
I don't know.
[whispers] She's fine.
-Lord! -Wow. Lord Jesus.
[man] Excuse me. Excuse me.
-Oh, there's some room over here. -Thanks. Thank you.
Oh shit! Camden?
-Damn, Mavis! How you be? -Good.
translation.zh:
‎-是你啊 梅维斯 你还好吗？
‎-很好

translation.en: Oh my goodness. What's up? What you doing in these parts?
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊 你来这里做什么？

translation.en: Oh, I just moved in around the corner.
What's it been? Like, two years?
Something like that. Two years, yeah.
Yo, those agency days were fun.
translation.zh: ‎真怀念当初在经纪公司的时候

translation.en: Yeah. Well, you look good. How are you?
translation.zh:
‎对啊 你看起来
‎状态不错 你过得还好吗？

translation.en: Oh shit! Was that a compliment from Mavis Beaumont?
translation.zh: ‎梅维斯博蒙特竟然夸口赞我了

translation.en: I look good? You look good.
Thank you.
Let me buy you a drink, boo.
Sure. Why not? I'll stay for one more. Let's catch up.
translation.zh: ‎可以啊 那我就再待一会 咱们叙叙旧

translation.en: Hell yeah. Let's get all up in the mustard and ketch-up.
translation.zh:
‎好啊 那咱们就
‎怀念一下激情燃烧的岁月

translation.en: [chuckles] That was good. America's Got Talent, ayo!
translation.zh:
‎太好了 这里是《美国达人秀》
‎请开始你的表演

translation.en: Nah, I low five.
Oh!
Yeah. Yeah. It's dangerous in these streets.
translation.zh: ‎这边治安不好 要看紧钱包

translation.en: -I keep my hand near my wallet. -I think I heard that.
translation.zh: ‎这边治安不好 要看紧钱包 ‎我略有耳闻

translation.en: You fuck around and high-five and get robbed.
I… I heard Shaun King talk about that.
Yeah.
I actually have a shot at my first lead styling gig.
translation.zh: ‎我得到了一个首席造型师的工作机会

translation.en: Do you remember, um, Sydney Dubois from Essence?
translation.zh:
‎你记得《本质》杂志的
‎悉尼杜布瓦吗？

translation.en: -Yeah. -I'm meeting her tomorrow.
-Oh… -Yeah. -Yeah, yeah. -Yeah!
Yeah. You better walk into your story and keep your plants watered, shorty.
translation.zh: ‎你要走好自己的路 替自己做好打算

translation.en: Oh my God! I always talk about watering my plants.
That is wild.
Do you, Mavis.
You mad special, mad talented, mad beautiful.
translation.zh: ‎你独一无二 聪明伶俐 性感动人

translation.en: Thanks, Cam.
I don't wanna get too excited, though, because her office hasn't confirmed yet,
translation.zh:
‎我不想高兴的太早
‎因为她的工作室还没跟我确认

translation.en: and Jacque did the introduction, so--
No, no. Not Jacque. Jacque. I always knew Jacque was a dummy.
I should call him right now and thank him
translation.zh: ‎我应该打给他 好好感谢他

translation.en: because one man's trash is another man's treasure. You feel me?
translation.zh:
‎他觉得你无所谓
‎但你在别人那里可是宝贝 明白吗？

translation.en: I do feel you, and I don't know why.
translation.zh: ‎明白 但我不知道你说这话什么意思

translation.en: You drop-dead beautiful. Beautiful Beaumont.
translation.zh: ‎你美得不可方物 简直是人间尤物啊

translation.en: Some motherfuckers just don't understand how good they have it.
-Do me a favor. -Yeah.
Remind me why you wouldn't go out with me.
I had a boyfriend at the time.
Really, Mavis. Fuck that dude. Let's stop talking about him.
translation.zh: ‎梅维斯 去他的 别提那个王八蛋了

translation.en: Because if you were ever my girl,
the whole bedroom would be the Vatican, and you'd be my Olivia Pope.
translation.zh: ‎那我就把你当皇上一样整天敬着

translation.en: Oh my God.
That is, like,
the sweetest thing anyone's ever said to me.
Oh my God.
I'm single. I'm single!
Oh shit!
Who that be?
It's Sydney Dubois's office.
translation.zh: ‎是悉尼杜布瓦工作室打来的

translation.en: They're confirming my meeting for tomorrow.
Well, go on. Tell 'em who you are.
Okay!
I'm Marvis Bormont, bitch!
Wait a minute.
[Mavis] Oh my God. Oh.
[Camden] Mm. Oh, Mavis, you taste so good. -[Mavis] Mm. -Taste so good.
[Mavis] It's the cardamom from the halal truck
and the… the Baileys from the screaming orgasms.
[Camden] Mm. Mavis. Mm! Oh, Mavis.
Oh, Camden, no!
What? Why is everything covered in olive oil?
Oh my God. Why won't you go down?
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊 怎么冲不下去

translation.en: -♪ Clap up like a round of applause… ♪ -You're okay. You're fine.
-♪ Clap clap clap clap… ♪ -You're still pretty.
I'm sorry.
I'm just… This is me single, okay?
And it's messy, and it's gross,
translation.zh: ‎刚才搞得一团糟 有些恶心

translation.en: and I'm really sorry, um, and…
I'm just so tired, and my tits are so heavy…
translation.zh: ‎我很累 我感觉我的奶沉甸甸的…

translation.en: Just come over here, and let me be your TA.
translation.zh: ‎过来 让我抚慰一下你的心灵

translation.en: My what?
Your titty assistant.
You are beautiful as fuck, no matter what.
And that's for real, for real.
So let me water them plants, girl.
[Mavis] Oh!
Jacque-y.
I'm so hungover.
I'm the motherfucking Allen-wrench master.
Can't nobody build shit like me.
They should call me Fix James.
I fix broke shit. I fix fixed shit.
I'm here to fix shit.
We have not seen this type of crazy in a very long time.
It's not helpful.
You had sex with him.
That feels judgy. Okay.
Hey.
Hey, look at this. All this with an Allen wrench, boo.
translation.zh: ‎你看看 我用一把通用扳手就搞定了

translation.en: Oh.
Wonderful. Um…
I think you could tell this is not the best version of me right now, and so, um…
translation.zh: ‎你也能看出来 我现在状态不好

translation.en: I'm sorry, but this just isn't gonna work out.
[Camden] It's a particle-board bookshelf.
I mean, it ain't all that, but, you know, it's…
You put my bed frame together too.
He also fixed the tub.
And you fixed the tub?
Look, I am fresh out of a relationship,
and, um, quite frankly, you shouldn't be so available for a person
translation.zh:
‎坦白说 如果你不清楚
‎别人对你的感觉

translation.en: when you don't know how they feel about you.
translation.zh: ‎那就不要急着开始一段感情

translation.en: You are a great guy. Honestly, you are. You, um…
translation.zh:
‎你是个好人 确实是
‎你就像是一款做工精细的胸罩

translation.en: You are like a well-made bra, honey. You are supportive and uplifting,
translation.zh:
‎你是个好人 确实是
‎你就像是一款做工精细的胸罩 ‎能够撑起我的大胸

translation.en: and your positive affirmations are so dope,
translation.zh: ‎你那种支撑感令我非常陶醉

translation.en: and boy, you are very good at other stuff too.
I'm talkin' 'bout the pussy stuff, Camden.
Very nice. Thank you so much.
Camden, there is somebody out there for you,
translation.zh: ‎卡姆登 你的真命天女还在等着你

translation.en: and she's gonna be so lucky when she finds you.
Damn, ma.
I'm just glad you told me that shit and kept it 100.
translation.zh:
‎我很高兴你能
‎跟我说这些掏心窝子的话

translation.en: Yo, I usually just get ghosted, but this was real as fuck.
translation.zh:
‎一般我约会完
‎对方就不回我信息了 但这次不一样

translation.en: Come here, man. Let me get a hug.
I need my wrench back.
Thank you.
-Mavis Beaumont, wake up! -Oh, oh!
I'm up.
I'm up. Why you gotta scare me like that?
How are you indoors but still look homeless?
translation.zh:
‎你怎么感觉还是
‎一副无家可归的样子？

translation.en: Okay, that's not nice.
Why aren't you ready? I thought we was gonna go eat before your meeting?
translation.zh:
‎怎么还没收拾好？
‎不是约好面试前一起吃饭吗？

translation.en: Oh. What time is it? I gotta call Sydney and reschedule.
translation.zh:
‎哦 几点了？
‎我要给悉尼打电话重新安排时间

translation.en: -I can't do this now. -No, no.
translation.zh:
‎-现在过去可不行 你做什么？
‎-不行

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Man, you ain't rescheduling.
translation.zh:
‎-现在过去可不行 你做什么？
‎-不行 ‎-不要改期
‎-什么？把手机还给我

translation.en: Uh-uh. Give me my phone back. What you doin'?
translation.zh:
‎-不要改期
‎-什么？把手机还给我

translation.en: -No. -Give me my phone back.
translation.zh:
‎-你在做什么？
‎-别 ‎-把手机还给我
‎-你在做什么？

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Why are your arms so long?
translation.zh:
‎-把手机还给我
‎-你在做什么？ ‎怎么你的手这么长？

translation.en: Why do you know so many weird guys?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么这么多奇奇怪怪的朋友？

translation.en: She takin' a bagel in the bathroom?
I am not letting you miss out on this opportunity.
translation.zh: ‎我不会让你错过这么宝贵的机会

translation.en: Khalil, I am exhausted,
and I don't have the energy to start over.
I can't go in there and be my dynamic self.
I just got cheated on.
I need time to heal.
Plus, last night, I had some cardamom and strange dick,
translation.zh:
‎而且昨晚我吃了
‎清真烤肉 还啃了别人的鸡鸡

translation.en: so I'm digesting a lot of things right now.
Mavis, night one?
I mean…
Look, you not ready for this. Also, with who?
translation.zh: ‎看来你还没准备好 你跟谁啊？

translation.en: You remember Camden from the agency?
translation.zh: ‎你记得经纪公司的卡姆登吗？

translation.en: Not fucked-up-teeth, can't high-five?
translation.zh: ‎不喜欢和人击掌的那个人吗？

translation.en: Yeah. He just got a new motorcycle jacket from Macy's,
translation.zh: ‎他从梅西百货买了一件新机车夹克

translation.en: and I don't know what happened.
translation.zh: ‎然后我就不知道发生了什么

translation.en: It was like a ghetto episode of British Bake Off,
but just with dick and street meat.
translation.zh: ‎嘴里含着鸡鸡就是一顿乱啃

translation.en: Mavis.
And I'm not talking 'bout the dick being the street meat, but it could've been.
translation.zh:
‎我也不知道到底
‎吃的是清真烤肉 还是鸡鸡

translation.en: I didn't know what the fuck I was eatin'.
Khalil, now you know why I gotta cancel.
translation.zh:
‎卡里尔 现在知道
‎我为什么要取消面试了吧

translation.en: No, no. You cannot cancel.
Look, stop telling yourself no before somebody else tells you no.
translation.zh: ‎听着 不要急着否定自己

translation.en: That's beautiful.
-Let me ask you this. Rapid fire. -All right. Hit me.
translation.zh: ‎我问你几个问题 快问快答 ‎好 来吧

translation.en: How long you been talking about being lead stylist?
translation.zh: ‎你念叨做首席造型师多久了？

translation.en: Like, in years?
How many times you had the opportunity to be lead stylist?
translation.zh: ‎像这样的机会你遇到过几次？

translation.en: None.
How many times you been to work for something really important hungover?
translation.zh: ‎你有多少次为了重要的事情而宿醉？

translation.en: -How many Mondays in a year? -Exactly. Come on, girl. You can do this.
translation.zh: ‎一年有几个星期一？ ‎加油 你可以的

translation.en: Now, go find a pencil and draw on some eyebrows,
and then put them dots under your eyes to do whatever that do.
translation.zh: ‎然后用那个什么遮住眼睛下面的瑕疵

translation.en: -What do you call that stuff? -It's concealer.
Conceal that shit, okay? And do whatever else women do to get ready.
translation.zh: ‎遮住那些瑕疵 赶快收拾好自己

translation.en: A'ight? Get you some ibuprofen and coconut water, and go get that shit.
translation.zh: ‎吃点布洛芬 喝点椰子水 拿下面试

translation.en: -♪ What you gonna let them see? ♪ -[Sydney] Wow. Yeah, I'm liking this.
I love it. You're so talented, Mavis.
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢 你真的很有才华 梅维斯

translation.en: -These are gorgeous mock-ups. -Thank you.
I could see Jacque really running with this. He's so good with movement.
translation.zh:
‎雅克一定能拍出这种感觉
‎他很擅长捕捉动作

translation.en: Yeah. Jacque is… really good with movement.
I, um… I don't think it's a great idea for us to collaborate on this together, though.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得还是不要让我跟他一起搭档

translation.en: -Really? -Mm-hmm.
Because he said he'd only shoot this if you were the lead stylist.
translation.zh:
‎他说只有你做首席造型师
‎他才答应拍照

translation.en: -He did? -[Jacque] Hey, babe.
Sydney, didn't I tell you how amazing she is?
translation.zh: ‎悉尼 我跟你说过她很厉害吧

translation.en: She's great.
No. No. Mm-mm. No.
No, thank you. Absolutely not. I am not doing this.
translation.zh: ‎不用了 谢谢 绝对不行 我不干

translation.en: -I'm sorry? -Mavis, don't be ridiculous.
translation.zh:
‎-你说什么？
‎-梅维斯 别胡闹啊

translation.en: What's happening here? Did I miss something?
Jacque and I are no longer working together, okay?
And I would love to stand here and say it's either him or me,
but I already know how that's gonna go, so…
translation.zh: ‎我已经知道结果了 所以…

translation.en: I just wanna make sure that the answer is…
translation.zh:
‎我还是想跟你确认一下
‎留他还是留我…

translation.en: Yeah, it's gonna be him.
Thank you for my iPad.
Mavis.
Mavis?
-Mavis, please. -What?
All right, just take a minute. I know you're upset with me,
translation.zh: ‎等一下 ‎我知道你很难过 但你别意气用事

translation.en: but just try and leave the emotion out of this.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你很难过 但你别意气用事

translation.en: I can help get this career off the ground--
translation.zh: ‎我可以帮你搞定工作上的事儿

translation.en: Let me stop you right there, okay? Please do not flatter yourself.
translation.zh: ‎打断你一下 拜托 你不要自以为是

translation.en: I have everything I need to make my own way.
Jacque, I loved you, and I would've done anything for you.
translation.zh:
‎雅克 我爱过你
‎我曾愿意为了你赴汤蹈火

translation.en: But my identity got mixed up with yours, and I let you take the lead.
translation.zh:
‎但我却错把你我混为一谈
‎一切都以你为中心

translation.en: And I got lost. But you know what?
translation.zh: ‎我曾经迷失了自己 但你知道吗？

translation.en: Here the fuck I am.
♪ Hey ♪
